Avengers-Endgame.title: Avengers-Endgame
Avengers-Endgame.cast: Robert Downey Jr, Chris Evans, Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo, Jeremy Renner, Scarlett Johansson
Avengers-Endgame.plot: With half of all life gone from Thanos’ snap, it is up to the original Avengers to do ‘whatever it takes’ to save the day.

Iron-Man.title: Iron-Man
Iron-Man.cast: Robert Downey Jr., Terrence Howard, Jeff Bridges, Gwyneth Paltrow
Iron-Man.plot: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

Thor.title: Thor
Thor.cast: Chris Hemsworth, Natalie Portman, Tom Hiddleston, Anthony Hopkins
Thor.plot: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.

Guardians-of-the-Galaxy.title: Guardians-of-the-Galaxy
Guardians-of-the-Galaxy.cast: Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana, Dave Bautista, Vin Diesel
Guardians-of-the-Galaxy.plot: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.
